text: The 1987 edition of the Women's Handball Tournament of the African Games was the 2nd, organized by the African Handball Confederation and played under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held in August 1987, in Nairobi, Kenya, contested by 8 national teams and won by Ivory Coast. ==Draw== {| class="wikitable" width=25% !width=50%|Group A !width=50%|Group B |- |valign=top| |valign=top| |} ==Preliminary round== ==Knockout stage== ;Championship bracket ==Final ranking== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !!width=170|Team |- |Image:Gold medal icon.svg |align=left| Ivory Coast |- |Image:Silver medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |Image:Bronze medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |4 |align=left| |- |5 |align=left| |- |6 |align=left| |- |7 |align=left| |- |8 |align=left| |} ==Awards== ==References== ==External links== * Official website Handball at the 1987 All-Africa Games Category:Women's handball in Kenya Category:Handball at the African Games Category:1987 in women's handball
title: Handball at the 1987 All-Africa Games – Women's tournament
